full_summary:
### Multiple Victoria-Class Spares Tender

**Title:** Multiple Victoria-Class Spares Tender

**Reference:** cb-6280-63667785

**Publication Date:** June 9, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** August 7, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

**Description:**

National Defence Canada (NDC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of various spares for the Victoria-Class vessels. The tender includes the following items:

* Gaskets (Items 1 and 2)
* O-Rings (Items 3, 4, 7, 8, 9, and 10)
* Parts Kits, Valves (Items 5 and 6)
* Panel Assemblies (Items 11 and 12)
* Spindles (Items 13 and 14)

The delivery locations are Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax and CFB Esquimalt.

### Tender Requirements

* The tender will be awarded based on the lowest price, considering the specifications and requirements outlined in the RFP.
* The selected bidder must provide a Qualification Statement, outlining their relevant experience and qualifications.
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product must indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number, as well as the National Stock Number (NSN) and the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code.
* The tender documents must be submitted in either English or French.

### Tender Opportunities

* This tender opportunity is open to domestic and international vendors.
* The successful bidder will be required to deliver the spares to the specified locations within the stipulated timeframe.
* The award of the tender will be made to the bidder submitting the lowest compliant bid, considering the specifications and requirements outlined in the RFP.

### Contact Info

* For further information, please contact: 
  Cassandra Leach, 
  Phone: (999) 999-9999, 
  Email: cassandra.leach@forces.gc.ca.

### Attachment

* The RFP document can be accessed on the Canada Buy Service website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6280/w8482-231409a---rfp.pdf

**Please note:** This tender is closed. The closing date has passed.  Please do not attempt to submit a bid at this time.
